00177         //      will add objects from array to the tags of each returned bookmark

00252 // Shallow (non-recursive) Mutating Actions
00253 // These methods do NOT:
00254 //   set up undo, tellTreeModified, incrementMyChangeCount, update windows, show items, or order windows.
00255 - (void)setToBkmmRSSFeed:(BmItem*)newRSSFeed ;
00256 - (BOOL)appendToBkmmParent:(BmItem*)newParent
00257                            onlyAtIndex:(unsigned int)newIndex ;
00258         // If newIndex is the next available index of newParent,
00259         //    adds self to children of newParent, sets self's KEY_PARENT, and returns YES
00260         // If cannot set at self at newIndex because not enough siblings,
00261         //    does nothing and returns NO ;
00262         // If newParent is nil, does nothing and returns NO ;
00263         // Does not remove from previous parent!  Use moveToBkmmParent: for that
00264 - (void)setToBkmmParent:(BmItem*)newParent atIndex:(unsigned int)newIndex ;
00265         // Adds self to children of newParent, and sets self's KEY_PARENT
00266         // To add as last child, pass newIndex=NSNotFound
00267         // If cannot set at newIndex because there are not that many siblings,
00268         //    adds as last sibling instead
00269         // To make orphan, pass newParent = nil ;
00270         // Does not remove from previous parent!  Use moveToBkmmParent: for that
00271 - (void)setToBkmmParent:(id)newParent ;
00272         // Sends -setToBkmmParent atIndex:NSNotFound
00273         // Does not remove from previous parent!  Use moveToBkmmParent: forthat
00274 - (void)moveToBkmmParent:(BmItem*)newParent atIndex:(unsigned int)newIndex ;
00275         // Sends setToBkmmParent but also remove self from previous parent,
00276         // To add as last sibling, pass newIndex = NSNotFound
00277 - (void)moveToBkmmParent:(BmItem*)newParent ;
00278         // Sends -moveToBkmmParent atIndex:NSNotFound
00279 - (void)remove ;
